newsitem.title: UK: Russia's SUN Group appoints new chairman.
newsitem.headline: Russia's SUN Group appoints new chairman.

text.p: Russia's SUN Group of companies, whose Global Depositary Receipts are quoted in Luxembourg and Berlin, has appointed Maxwell Asgari as chairman.

SUN said in a statement that Asgari, 57, formerly president and chief executive of Asea Brown Boveri in Russia, will join the Russian investment group which has interests in confectionery and brewing to oversee investment strategy and management.
